name: Roguelite: Micro Edition
description:
[A small project made in 2 months for a unity course]

You play as a mine knight, a dangerous role that has led to the demise of many before you and will lead many to the same fate.

Protect the mines from the invading trolls and mages for as long as you can.

And leave your mark as the strongest mine knight in history.

Art by 0x72: https://0x72.itch.io/microfantasy
